title: Sveltekit 2.0 Migrate Scripts adds comments to unrelated delete Method
body:
### Describe the bug

The npx migration script for sveltekit 2.0 puts comments about the missing path property on unrelated .delete code. For our codebase, it was this code:


```ts
		await /* @migration task: add path argument */ locals.prisma.transcript.delete({
			where: {
				show_number
			}
		});
```

and


```ts
		await /* @migration task: add path argument */ locals.prisma.session.delete({
			where: {
				access_token: cookies.get('access_token')
			}
		});
```

Not a big deal, but I thought you should know. 

### Reproduction

try migrate a website with .delete() 

### Logs

_No response_

### System Info

```Shell
System:
    OS: macOS 13.6.2
    CPU: (10) arm64 Apple M1 Max
    Memory: 4.71 GB / 64.00 GB
    Shell: 5.9 - /bin/zsh
  Binaries:
    Node: 20.8.0 - /usr/local/bin/node
    Yarn: 1.22.19 - /usr/local/bin/yarn
    npm: 10.1.0 - /usr/local/bin/npm
    pnpm: 8.3.1 - /usr/local/bin/pnpm
    bun: 1.0.0 - ~/.bun/bin/bun
  Browsers:
    Brave Browser: 116.1.57.53
    Chrome: 120.0.6099.109
    Chrome Canary: 122.0.6184.0
    Edge: 81.0.416.64
    Firefox Nightly: 121.0a1
    Safari: 16.6
    Safari Technology Preview: 17.0
  npmPackages:
    @sveltejs/adapter-vercel: ^4.0.0 => 4.0.0
    @sveltejs/kit: ^2.0.0 => 2.0.0
    @sveltejs/vite-plugin-svelte: ^3.0.0 => 3.0.0
    svelte: ^4.2.8 => 4.2.8
    vite: ^5.0.9 => 5.0.9
```


### Severity

annoyance

### Additional Information

_No response_
